      • setCancellable

        public Dialog setCancellable(boolean cancellable)
        Description copied from interface: Dialog
        Set the dialog as cancellable
        Specified by:
        setCancellable in interface Dialog
        Parameters:
        cancellable - if true, the dialog will be closed, and onCancelled will be called. However if it is false, the player cannot exit the inventory unless called.
        Returns:
        the dialog modified

      • onClick

        public boolean onClick(Element element,
                       org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Description copied from interface: Window
        Fired when an element is clicked
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface Window
        Overrides:
        onClick in class PhantomWindow
        Parameters:
        element - the clicked element
        p - the clicker
        Returns:
        if true is returned, the element event will be called. If false, the element event wont be registered, effectivley cancelling it
